text: The smart mattress is a mattress that has sensors to monitor sleep patterns. Major vendors include Casper Sleep, Eight Sleep, Kingsdown, Leggett & Platt, Nectar Sleep, Responsive Surface Technology, and Sleep Number. Products can take the form of mattress covers, mattress pads, or the entire mattress. Black Friday Mattress Deals ==References== Category:Mattresses
